contentrichtext.text: '''Yvette N. Rekangali''' is a [[Gabon]]ese [[politician]].[http://www.africa-union.org/organs/ecosocc/LIST%20OF%20%20MEMBERS%20OF%20%20ECOSOCC%20COMMITTEES.pdf] She is one of three members of the [[African Union]]'s [[Economic, Social and Cultural Council]] representing [[Central Africa]]. She is also Chairperson of the [[Infrastructure and Energy Committee]]. {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Rekangali, Yvette | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Gabonese politician | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Rekangali, Yvette}} [[Category:African Union officials]] [[Category:Economic, Social and Cultural Council]] [[Category:ECOSOCC officials|Rekangali, Yvette N.]] [[Category:ECOSOCC Standing Committee members]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Gabonese women in politics]] {{Gabon-politician-stub}}
